title: Process Annuity Death Benefit Payout
description: The beneficiary of an annuity contract needs to start the process of receiving the death benefit.

tasks.description: Identify the deceased contract holder and the beneficiary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the annuity contract and confirms the caller is the beneficiary.

tasks.description: Explain the available payout options (e.g., lump sum, stretch over 10 years).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the different ways the beneficiary can receive the funds, including tax implications.

tasks.description: Collect the necessary forms and documents to process the selected payout option.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the required forms to the beneficiary to start the payout process.
